brainly_data.question:
Which of the following is the best definition of convection?

a) movement of heat through space

b) melting of metal over a fire

c) movement of hot materials due to density differences
brainly_data.subject: Chemistry

all_answers.question:
Which of the following is the best definition of convection?

a) movement of heat through space

b) melting of metal over a fire

c) movement of hot materials due to density differences
all_answers.subject: Chemistry
all_answers.text: a) movement of heat through space
